name: places/ChIJk_TAaqJZwokRsjaKMZKxbC4
adrFormatAddress: 865 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: First time going to this store and the last. My husband brought me there to shop for my birthday. Right off the bat a salesperson was trying to sell me a super large jar of cream that costs $120+ and when I asked if they had a smaller size so I can see if I like it before investing in such a large jar she said, "No, but you can just keep the receipt and bring it back if you don't like it." She pretty much gave up helping me after that and didn't try to offer me any other brands, just wanted to make that large sale I guess? Then another employee that was listening suggested we try their clearance table...after that we walked out. We're not cheap, just not interested in buying an enormous jar of cream I'm not sure I like. We went across the street to Fresh and spent some good money in there. If your salespeople weren't such snobs they would've made a nice sale too.

originalText.text: I went in a few weeks ago seeking advice on upping my makeup game with a more updated look.  I was so happy to have been fortunate enough to be paired up with Jeanne.   She did a wonderful job of showing me what to use and how to use it.  I couldn't be happier with the Trish McEvoy products she suggested and I've gotten many compliments since using them.  I'll definitely be returning for more in the future.

originalText.text: Bluemercury Union Square has been my favorite store and location for years now. Great selection of products. Extremely friendly, knowledgeable and helpful staff in every department skincare, fragrance, makeup and so forth. Highly recommend asking for Lauren she is sincerely amazing. Genuine, completely honest with opinion on brands, quality and value versus might be paying a little more for a name but if in search of something more in your budget gives you honest feedback and opinion. She'll tell you what you do and don't need in case you go overboard which, I may have tendency to do. Jackie, San, Ari and Tracy are all great and everyone works well to make the shop a very pleasant experience. Highly recommend

originalText.text: Very clean and upscale. Wonderful staff and makeup selection... Its just that I was the only customer browsing around (that made it awkward) I got 2 free samples with my purchase though. Would definitely go again

text.text: Very clean and upscale. Wonderful staff and makeup selection... Its just that I was the only customer browsing around (that made it awkward) I got 2 free samples with my purchase though. Would definitely go again

originalText.text:
Disgusting and rude customer service.
I walk-in the store and the sales associate doesn't speak to me at all.
Some random associate yells hello from the back of the store. The associate that doesn't speak to me is helping someone else and doesn't even acknowledge my presence.

So when I finally get someone to help me to get the product I want, he then proceeds to tell me to wait hold on and walk to the back of the store.

At this point I just leave the store because I've been waiting for no apparent reason. The absurd part of all this is that there's only one other customer in the Store .
